name: places/ChIJD0Rb0x_0wokR2HvNUUemTd4
formattedAddress: 140 Wadsworth Ave, New York, NY 10033, USA
adrFormatAddress: 140 Wadsworth Ave, New York, NY 10033, USA

originalText.text: This place is incredibly slow. If you need a document to be completed by the doctor, expect the front desk staff members to be unmotivated to complete the forms and combative when you follow up. As a care manager, I have never in my life made any of my chronically ill patients wait 3 weeks or more for a transportation form to be completed. The front desk staff members are comfortable with their jobs and are unprofessional, they also provide their patients with incorrect referrals. This office lacks resources, structure, and organization. They do not work as a team and and they lack compassion towards their community. There is no time for insensitivity and inefficiency in the health care sector, and this office has proven the importance of consistent and adequate quality care.

originalText.text: Well this place probably has good doctors I don’t even know because the perdón who answers the phone her name is yobanka Reyes is soooo has such a diminished nasty tone and way of talking to you, that it takes the taste of the whole place.... doesn’t matter how nice you will talk to her she would still slashes you with her rudeness, is awful how people like her deals with sick people.

originalText.text: tengo  10  years   en ese  lugar con  doctor  fajardo   y  es muy  bueno   y muy  buenas atencion

text.text: I have been in that place with Dr. Fajardo for 10 years and he is very good and gives very good attention.

originalText.text: Muchas amabilidad,  conocimientos de su área, puntual cuando tenemos una  la cita  oh emergencia,

text.text: Very kind, knowledgeable about your area, punctual when we have an emergency appointment,

originalText.text: Excelente  el trato k t dan muy cordiales todo el personal chicas excelente la doctora fajardo  te sientes en confianza

text.text: The treatment is excellent and the entire staff is very friendly, the girls are excellent, Dr. Fajardo makes you feel confident.
